levers.label: Avoid
levers.description: Passenger and freight transport demand reduction. [More info](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1kO_jI-8VEQi-XYh6ZcMNFZSGf_RDBC0r/view?usp=sharing)

levers.label: Shift
levers.description: Modal shift, vehicle utilisation rate increase, vehicle occupancy increase. [More info](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1KIBk6Cn8-XP2E6ZNqcY3meghpYvVNqrA/view?usp=sharing)

levers.label: Improve
levers.description: Transport technology switch away from emitting vehicles. [More info](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1KCqVBt3Nay5Q0uLXn10gO48saEuuC9dJ/view?usp=sharing)

levers.label: Transform
levers.description: Decarbonisation of the power sector and fuel blending. [More info](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1T0sX78iissYa7XJhVF0n-AfUUwsPM6Kr/view?usp=sharing)

levers.label: Costs
levers.description: Steeper cost reductions for developing technologies. [More info](https://drive.google.com/file/d/10AmbAQpY2eS0JdMsu_-2thA0b0qM4lN-/view?usp=sharing)
